Use the

The correct definition of The else Statement

else

quiz.question: What is block of code to be executed if the condition?

summary: This tutorial covers C#The else Statement concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use C#The else Statement effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of C#The else Statement and how to apply it in your projects.
